comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to theesotericcuriosa.blogspot.com/2011/02/little-prince-eur... he was Prince Mirko Dimitri Petrović-Njegoš of Montenegro, Grand Voivode of Grahovo and Zetà. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Mirko_of_Montenegro has a photo that looks the same except that it has a way more extended mustache.
